root.name: Journey Escape
root.description: Overview In 1982, Journey: Escape was released for the Atari 2600. The player must guide the band members of Journey to their escape vehicle after a performance. You must dodge shady promoters, groupies and you have a manager and roadies to help you along the way. The whole band is there, drummer Steve Smith, keyboardist Jonathan Cain, bass player Ross Valory, lead guitarist Neal Schon, and lead singer Steve Perry, and they need your help to make it to the Journey Escape Van to make it to the next gig. As the Band says, "Some will win, Some will lose" but that is up to you. Even though the game is Called Escape and came out with the same box art as the album with the same name, the song "Escape" is not featured in the game. The intro to the game is an excerpt of "Don't Stop Believing" also from that album.
